Courses: Column: id, Type: INTEGER, Nullable: 0, Default: None
Column: course_code, Type: VARCHAR(3), Nullable: 0, Default: None
Column: course_title, Type: VARCHAR(255), Nullable: 0, Default: None
Column: year_created, Type: SMALLINT, Nullable: 0, Default: None
Column: year_cancelled, Type: SMALLINT, Nullable: 0, Default: None
Column: coordinator_name, Type: VARCHAR(255), Nullable: 0, Default: None
Column: coordinator_email, Type: VARCHAR(255), Nullable: 0, Default: None
Column: coordinator_mobile, Type: VARCHAR(10), Nullable: 0, Default: None
Students: Column: student_id, Type: VARCHAR(8), Nullable: 0, Default: None
Column: fname, Type: VARCHAR(255), Nullable: 0, Default: None
Column: lname, Type: VARCHAR(255), Nullable: 0, Default: None
Column: email, Type: VARCHAR(255), Nullable: 0, Default: None
Column: mobile, Type: VARCHAR(10), Nullable: 0, Default: None
Column: course_code, Type: VARCHAR(255), Nullable: 0, Default: None
Column: units_attempted, Type: SMALLINT, Nullable: 0, Default: None
Column: units_completed, Type: SMALLINT, Nullable: 0, Default: None
Column: course_status, Type: VARCHAR(255), Nullable: 0, Default: None
StudentUnits: Column: id, Type: INTEGER, Nullable: 0, Default: None
Column: student_id, Type: VARCHAR(8), Nullable: 0, Default: None
Column: unit_code, Type: VARCHAR(7), Nullable: 0, Default: None
Column: unit_title, Type: VARCHAR(255), Nullable: 0, Default: None
Column: unit_score, Type: SMALLINT, Nullable: 0, Default: None
Column: year_attempted, Type: SMALLINT, Nullable: 0, Default: None
Column: semester_attempted, Type: SMALLINT, Nullable: 0, Default: None
Column: note, Type: TEXT, Nullable: 0, Default: None
